message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point, but I'm open to discussing a mutually agreeable figure.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $16,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, however, the lowest I can go is $18,000. This is a very competitive price for what the product offers.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer, but I still feel that $16,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope you can meet me halfway.
